hashCode() - Method in class remixlab.util.HashCodeBuilder
The computed hashCode from toHashCode() is returned due to the likelyhood of bugs in mis-calling toHashCode() and the unlikelyness of it mattering what the hashCode for HashCodeBuilder itself is.

setDefaultKeyboardShortcuts() - Method in class remixlab.proscene.Scene
Restores the default keyboard shortcuts: 'a' -> KeyboardAction.TOGGLE_AXES_VISUAL_HINT
'f' -> KeyboardAction.TOGGLE_FRAME_VISUAL_HINT
'g' -> KeyboardAction.TOGGLE_GRID_VISUAL_HINT
'm' -> KeyboardAction.TOGGLE_ANIMATION
'e' -> KeyboardAction.TOGGLE_CAMERA_TYPE
'h' -> KeyboardAction.DISPLAY_INFO
'r' -> KeyboardAction.TOGGLE_PATHS_VISUAL_HINT
's' -> KeyboardAction.INTERPOLATE_TO_FIT
'S' -> KeyboardAction.SHOW_ALL
left_arrow -> KeyboardAction.MOVE_LEFT
right_arrow -> KeyboardAction.MOVE_RIGHT
up_arrow -> KeyboardAction.MOVE_UP
down_arrow -> KeyboardAction.MOVE_DOWN
'CTRL' + '1' -> KeyboardAction.ADD_KEYFRAME_TO_PATH_1
'ALT' + '1' -> KeyboardAction.DELETE_PATH_1
'1' -> KeyboardAction.PLAY_PATH_1
'CTRL' + '2' -> KeyboardAction.ADD_KEYFRAME_TO_PATH_2
'ALT' + '2' -> KeyboardAction.DELETE_PATH_2
'2' -> KeyboardAction.PLAY_PATH_2
'CTRL' + '3' -> KeyboardAction.ADD_KEYFRAME_TO_PATH_3
'ALT' + '3' -> KeyboardAction.DELETE_PATH_3
'3' -> KeyboardAction.PLAY_PATH_3
setDefaultShortcuts() - Method in class remixlab.dandelion.agent.KeyboardAgent
Set the default keyboard shortcuts as follows: 'a' -> KeyboardAction.TOGGLE_AXIS_VISUAL_HINT
'f' -> KeyboardAction.TOGGLE_FRAME_VISUAL_HINT
'g' -> KeyboardAction.TOGGLE_GRID_VISUAL_HINT
'm' -> KeyboardAction.TOGGLE_ANIMATION
'e' -> KeyboardAction.TOGGLE_CAMERA_TYPE
'h' -> KeyboardAction.DISPLAY_INFO
'r' -> KeyboardAction.TOGGLE_PATHS_VISUAL_HINT
's' -> KeyboardAction.INTERPOLATE_TO_FIT
'S' -> KeyboardAction.SHOW_ALL
setDefaultShortcuts() - Method in class remixlab.proscene.Scene.ProsceneKeyboard
Calls KeyboardAgent.setDefaultShortcuts() and then adds the following: left_arrow -> KeyboardAction.MOVE_LEFT
right_arrow -> KeyboardAction.MOVE_RIGHT
up_arrow -> KeyboardAction.MOVE_UP
down_arrow -> KeyboardAction.MOVE_DOWN
CTRL + java.awt.event.KeyEvent.VK_1 -> KeyboardAction.ADD_KEYFRAME_TO_PATH_1
ALT + java.awt.event.KeyEvent.VK_1 -> KeyboardAction.DELETE_PATH_1
CTRL + java.awt.event.KeyEvent.VK_2 -> KeyboardAction.ADD_KEYFRAME_TO_PATH_2
ALT + java.awt.event.KeyEvent.VK_2 -> KeyboardAction.DELETE_PATH_2
CTRL + java.awt.event.KeyEvent.VK_3 -> KeyboardAction.ADD_KEYFRAME_TO_PATH_3
ALT + java.awt.event.KeyEvent.VK_3 -> KeyboardAction.DELETE_PATH_3
Finally, it calls: setKeyCodeToPlayPath(java.awt.event.KeyEvent.VK_1, 1), setKeyCodeToPlayPath(java.awt.event.KeyEvent.VK_2, 2) and setKeyCodeToPlayPath(java.awt.event.KeyEvent.VK_3, 3) to play the paths.

setMouseAsThirdPerson() - Method in class remixlab.proscene.Scene
Set mouse bindings as third-person: Left button -> MOVE_FORWARD
Center button -> LOOK_AROUND
Right button -> MOVE_BACKWARD
Shift + Left button -> ROLL
Shift + Center button -> DRIVE
Also set the following (common) bindings are: 2 left clicks -> ALIGN_FRAME
2right clicks -> CENTER_FRAME
Wheel in 2D -> SCALE both, InteractiveFrame and InteractiveEyeFrame
Wheel in 3D -> SCALE InteractiveFrame, and ZOOM InteractiveEyeFrame
